QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS person_id, CAST(RIGHT(Claim_ID, LEN(Claim_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT) AS visit_occurrence_id, 0 AS drug_concept_id, Date_of_prescription AS drug_exposure_start_date, CASE WHEN duration_per_prescription < 1 THEN 1 WHEN duration_per_prescription > 180 THEN 180 ELSE duration_per_prescription END AS days_supply, CASE WHEN Type_of_claim = 'Outpatient' OR Type_of_claim = 'Pharmacy' THEN 32869 ELSE 32818 END AS drug_type_concept_id, drug_code AS drug_source_value, CASE WHEN daily_dose_per_prescription IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(daily_dose_per_prescription AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + unit_of_administered_amount ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN as_needed_medication_flag = 1 THEN ' as needed' ELSE '' END AS sig, actual_point * 10 AS total_paid, 44818592 as CurrencyConceptId, CASE WHEN physician_id IS NULL or LEN(physician_id) = 0 THEN CAST('1' + RIGHT(institution_id, LEN(institution_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) ELSE CAST('2' + RIGHT(physician_id, LEN(physician_id) - 1) AS BIGINT) END AS provider_id FROM {sc}.Drug d JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.Member_ID = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by CAST(RIGHT(Member_ID, LEN(Member_ID) - 1) AS BIGINT)
